definition: to reflect (light)/to shine/to project (an image onto a screen etc)
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
to mirror/to reflect/mirror image/reflection/(fig.) to report/to make known/to render
to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
to set off by contrast/antithesis/analogy parallelism (linguistics)
hidden from view/alternately hidden and visible/setting off each other
to shine on/(math., linguistics etc) mapping
to set each other off nicely

sentences.english: Would you please send me the data bye-mail?
sentences.chinese: 您能用电子映觜将原料传支给我吗？

sentences.english: It was a film reflects in my failure life.
sentences.chinese: 那是一幕电影映在我失败的人生里。

sentences.english: The glory of the dawn [morning] is mirrored on [in] the lake.
Their smiling faces were reflected in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 他们的笑脸映现在镜中。

sentences.english: I need to receive and answer emails in English every day, but I don't know many English words.
sentences.chinese: 每天我皆需供支收英语映觜，我词汇量没有除夜。

sentences.english: The night sky was reddened by the sweeping fire.
sentences.chinese: 漫天的大火把夜空映了个通红。

sentences.english: Lens color was black eyes reflect go, so that other people can't see.
sentences.chinese: 镜片颜色因被黑眼珠映下去，所以别人看不出。

sentences.english: Visions of the golden wheat fields seemed to fill his thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 金色麦田的景象映现在他的脑海中。

sentences.english: Familiar scenes were imaged on the screen .
sentences.chinese: 熟悉的情景映现在银幕上。

sentences.english: The heavens change every moment, and reflect their glory or gloom on the plains beneath.
sentences.chinese: 天空变幻无穷，映呈着下界的盛衰枯荣。

sentences.english: The moon reflects their flowers, the apricot.
sentences.chinese: 明月映花香，杏茶醉愁肠。

sentences.english: Sunlight streamed in on her face.
sentences.chinese: 阳光照射进屋里，映在她的脸上。

sentences.english: Brilliant fireworks reflect the sky, harmony Changning Revitalisation.
sentences.chinese: 焰火烂漫映长空，和谐昌宁展新姿。

sentences.english: Deciduous love reflected chrysanthemum, the unintentional as sunset.
sentences.chinese: 落叶有情映菊花，残阳无意照晚霞。

sentences.english: The glory of the mornig is mirrored in the sea.
Noctuid winging over, its shadow reflected on the wall just like a fish soaring in the water.
sentences.chinese: 夜蛾飞过映在墙上的影子就是游鱼。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
to shine brightly/(fig.) to perceive clearly
variant of 輝映|辉映[hui1 ying4]
